subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Clemson and South Carolina officially named their yearly football game the Palmetto Bowl. The No. 23 Tigers (8-3) host the Gamecocks (6-5) on Saturday in the teams’ 112th meeting.
snippet: Clemson and South Carolina officially named their yearly football game the Palmetto Bowl. The No. 23 Tigers (8-3) host the Gamecocks (6-5) on Saturday in the teams’ 112th meeting.
